title: 16 Fun Pairs of Earrings Under $50
text:
Photo: Amazon

Now is the perfect time of year to buy fun new earrings. It’s fall, but it’s not real fall, when you can wear sweaters and boots and all those new things you’re currently browsing when you’re bored at work. But you’re also probably totally sick of your summer clothing, since you’ve been wearing it since May. If you feel the profound need to switch up your look, try one of these 16 options from Amazon. They’re all under $50, and some of them are under $15.

A Floral for Fall

If You’re More of an Ear-Cuff Person

If You’re Longing for Summer Again

If You Have a Secret Punk Streak

Shashi Women's Vixen Earrings The diamond studs say “I’m a functioning adult,” but the little dagger whispers, “But I have a dark side.” $31 at Amazon Buy $31 at Amazon Buy

If You Like to Combine Trends

Shashi Women's Lola Baltic Huggie Earrings $32 (was $64, now 50% off) Pearls are having a moment, shells are having a moment. Put them together and you have this earring! $32 at Amazon Buy $32 at Amazon Buy

If You’re Attracted to Classics

Kate Spade New York Women's Mini Round Stud Earrings Nothing wrong with a shiny little stud. It’s even better when it’s in a bright color like magenta. $38 at Amazon Buy $38 at Amazon Buy

If You Like Hoops but Also Like Being Different

If You’re a Preppy at Heart

If You Want Something Simple but Not Too Simple

If You Love Color

Jinling Floral Print Acrylic Drop Dangle Earrings Summer Beach Earrings $13 (was $30, now 57% off) Wear ’em with a black turtleneck, wear ’em with a colorful, maximal rainbow outfit. Either way, they’ll add a bit of sunshine to your look. $13 at Amazon Buy $13 at Amazon Buy

If You Need a Basic

If You Need a Basic but Prefer Silver

sense925 Sterling Silver Hinged Hoop Earrings Speak for themselves. Plus, unlike small, dainty hoops, these have a nice heft to them. $28 at Amazon Buy $28 at Amazon Buy

If You Haven’t Let Old Céline Go

If You Like to Buy in Bulk

Holfeun 3 Pairs Big Hoop Earrings, Stainless Steel Hoop Earrings Or if you can’t decide whether gold, rose gold, or silver is really your color. $8 at Amazon Buy $8 at Amazon Buy

If You’re Into the Memphis Design Revival

MOLOCH Acrylic Statement Tortoise Hoop Resin Wire Drop Dangle Earrings $8 (was $70, now 89% off) The color scheme and the nontraditional post (no earring backs!) make this feel like it’s an extension of what Ettore Sottsass & Co. have wrought. $8 at Amazon Buy $8 at Amazon Buy

If You Really Loved the ‘Lover’ Video

GVUSMIL Long Acrylic Petal Drop Dangle Earrings Taylor wears a pair of sunshine-y drop earrings in her “Lover” video. If you love the look, these are a good dupe. $11 at Amazon Buy $11 at Amazon Buy

If you buy something through our links, New York may earn an affiliate commission.
description: 16 fun earrings under $50 to add to your Amazon cart. Featuring hoop earrings, statement earrings, and more.
